003package choreo;
004
005import static edu.wpi.first.util.ErrorMessages.requireNonNullParam;
006
007import choreo.auto.AutoChooser;
008import choreo.auto.AutoFactory;
009import choreo.auto.AutoFactory.AutoBindings;
010import choreo.auto.AutoRoutine;
011import choreo.auto.AutoTrajectory;
012import choreo.trajectory.DifferentialSample;
013import choreo.trajectory.EventMarker;
014import choreo.trajectory.ProjectFile;
015import choreo.trajectory.SwerveSample;
016import choreo.trajectory.Trajectory;
017import choreo.trajectory.TrajectorySample;
018import com.google.gson.Gson;
019import com.google.gson.GsonBuilder;
020import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
021import com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException;
022import edu.wpi.first.hal.FRCNetComm.tResourceType;
023import edu.wpi.first.hal.HAL;
024import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d;
025import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DriverStation;
026import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DriverStation.Alliance;
027import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Filesystem;
028import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Command;
029import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem;
030import java.io.BufferedReader;
031import java.io.File;
032import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
033import java.io.FileReader;
034import java.io.IOException;
035import java.util.ArrayList;
036import java.util.Arrays;
037import java.util.HashMap;
038import java.util.List;
039import java.util.Map;
040import java.util.Optional;
041import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
042import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
043import java.util.function.Consumer;
044import java.util.function.Supplier;
045
046/** Utilities to load and follow Choreo Trajectories */
047public final class Choreo {
048  private static final Gson GSON =
049      new GsonBuilder()
050          .registerTypeAdapter(EventMarker.class, new EventMarker.Deserializer())
051          .create();
052  private static final String TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION = ".traj";
053  private static final int TRAJ_SCHEMA_VERSION = 0;
054  private static final int PROJECT_SCHEMA_VERSION = 1;
055
056  private static File CHOREO_DIR = new File(Filesystem.getDeployDirectory(), "choreo");
057
058  private static Optional<ProjectFile> LAZY_PROJECT_FILE = Optional.empty();
059
060  /** This should only be used for unit testing. */
061  static void setChoreoDir(File choreoDir) {
062    CHOREO_DIR = choreoDir;
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Gets the project file from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects a .chor file to be placed in
067   * src/main/deploy/choreo.
068   *
069   * <p>The result is cached after the first call.
070   *
071   * @return the project file
072   */
073  public static ProjectFile getProjectFile() {
074    if (LAZY_PROJECT_FILE.isPresent()) {
075      return LAZY_PROJECT_FILE.get();
076    }
077    try {
078      // find the first file that ends with a .chor extension
079      File[] projectFiles = CHOREO_DIR.listFiles((dir, name) -> name.endsWith(".chor"));
080      if (projectFiles.length == 0) {
081        throw new RuntimeException("Could not find project file in deploy directory");
082      } else if (projectFiles.length > 1) {
083        throw new RuntimeException("Found multiple project files in deploy directory");
084      }
085      BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(projectFiles[0]));
086      String str = reader.lines().reduce("", (a, b) -> a + b);
087      reader.close();
088      JsonObject json = GSON.fromJson(str, JsonObject.class);
089      int version;
090      try {
091        version = json.get("version").getAsInt();
092        if (version != PROJECT_SCHEMA_VERSION) {
093          throw new RuntimeException(
094              ".chor project file: Wrong version "
095                  + version
096                  + ". Expected "
097                  + PROJECT_SCHEMA_VERSION);
098        }
099      } catch (ClassCastException e) {
100        throw new RuntimeException(
101            ".chor project file: Wrong version "
102                + json.get("version").getAsString()
103                + ". Expected "
104                + PROJECT_SCHEMA_VERSION);
105      }
106      LAZY_PROJECT_FILE = Optional.of(GSON.fromJson(str, ProjectFile.class));
107    } catch (JsonSyntaxException ex) {
108      throw new RuntimeException("Could not parse project file", ex);
109    } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) {
110      throw new RuntimeException("Could not find project file", ex);
111    } catch (IOException ex) {
112      throw new RuntimeException("Could not close the project file", ex);
113    }
114    return LAZY_PROJECT_FILE.get();
115  }
116
117  /**
118   * This interface exists as a type alias. A TrajectoryLogger has a signature of ({@link
119   * Trajectory}, {@link Boolean})-&gt;void, where the function consumes a trajectory and a boolean
120   * indicating whether the trajectory is starting or finishing.
121   *
122   * @param <SampleType> DifferentialSample or SwerveSample.
123   */
124  public interface TrajectoryLogger<SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>>
125      extends BiConsumer<Trajectory<SampleType>, Boolean> {}
126
127  /** Default constructor. */
128  private Choreo() {
129    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("This is a utility class!");
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * Load a trajectory from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects .traj files to be placed in
134   * src/main/deploy/choreo/[trajectoryName].traj.
135   *
136   * @param <SampleType> The type of samples in the trajectory.
137   * @param trajectoryName The path name in Choreo, which matches the file name in the deploy
138   *     directory, file extension is optional.
139   * @return The loaded trajectory, or `Optional.empty()` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
140   */
141  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
142  public static <SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>>
143      Optional<Trajectory<SampleType>> loadTrajectory(String trajectoryName) {
144    requireNonNullParam(trajectoryName, "trajectoryName", "Choreo.loadTrajectory");
145
146    if (trajectoryName.endsWith(TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION)) {
147      trajectoryName =
148          trajectoryName.substring(0, trajectoryName.length() - TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION.length());
149    }
150    File trajectoryFile = new File(CHOREO_DIR, trajectoryName + TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION);
151    try {
152      var reader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(trajectoryFile));
153      String str = reader.lines().reduce("", (a, b) -> a + b);
154      reader.close();
155      Trajectory<SampleType> trajectory =
156          (Trajectory<SampleType>) loadTrajectoryString(str, getProjectFile());
157      return Optional.of(trajectory);
158    } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) {
159      DriverStation.reportError("Could not find trajectory file: " + trajectoryFile, false);
160    } catch (JsonSyntaxException ex) {
161      DriverStation.reportError("Could not parse trajectory file: " + trajectoryFile, false);
162    } catch (Exception ex) {
163      DriverStation.reportError(ex.getMessage(), ex.getStackTrace());
164    }
165    return Optional.empty();
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Load a trajectory from a string.
170   *
171   * @param trajectoryJsonString The JSON string.
172   * @param projectFile The project file.
173   * @return The loaded trajectory, or `empty std::optional` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
174   */
175  static Trajectory<? extends TrajectorySample<?>> loadTrajectoryString(
176      String trajectoryJsonString, ProjectFile projectFile) {
177    JsonObject wholeTrajectory = GSON.fromJson(trajectoryJsonString, JsonObject.class);
178    String name = wholeTrajectory.get("name").getAsString();
179    int version;
180    try {
181      version = wholeTrajectory.get("version").getAsInt();
182      if (version != TRAJ_SCHEMA_VERSION) {
183        throw new RuntimeException(
184            name + ".traj: Wrong version: " + version + ". Expected " + TRAJ_SCHEMA_VERSION);
185      }
186    } catch (ClassCastException e) {
187      throw new RuntimeException(
188          name
189              + ".traj: Wrong version: "
190              + wholeTrajectory.get("version").getAsString()
191              + ". Expected "
192              + TRAJ_SCHEMA_VERSION);
193    }
194    // Filter out markers with negative timestamps or empty names
195    List<EventMarker> unfilteredEvents =
196        new ArrayList<EventMarker>(
197            Arrays.asList(GSON.fromJson(wholeTrajectory.get("events"), EventMarker[].class)));
198    unfilteredEvents.removeIf(marker -> marker.timestamp < 0 || marker.event.length() == 0);
199    EventMarker[] events = new EventMarker[unfilteredEvents.size()];
200    unfilteredEvents.toArray(events);
201
202    JsonObject trajectoryObj = wholeTrajectory.getAsJsonObject("trajectory");
203    Integer[] splits = GSON.fromJson(trajectoryObj.get("splits"), Integer[].class);
204    if (splits.length == 0 || splits[0] != 0) {
205      Integer[] newArray = new Integer[splits.length + 1];
206      newArray[0] = 0;
207      System.arraycopy(splits, 0, newArray, 1, splits.length);
208      splits = newArray;
209    }
210    if (projectFile.type.equals("Swerve")) {
211      HAL.report(tResourceType.kResourceType_ChoreoTrajectory, 1);
212
213      SwerveSample[] samples = GSON.fromJson(trajectoryObj.get("samples"), SwerveSample[].class);
214      return new Trajectory<SwerveSample>(name, List.of(samples), List.of(splits), List.of(events));
215    } else if (projectFile.type.equals("Differential")) {
216      HAL.report(tResourceType.kResourceType_ChoreoTrajectory, 2);
217
218      DifferentialSample[] sampleArray =
219          GSON.fromJson(trajectoryObj.get("samples"), DifferentialSample[].class);
220      return new Trajectory<DifferentialSample>(
221          name, List.of(sampleArray), List.of(splits), List.of(events));
222    } else {
223      throw new RuntimeException("Unknown project type: " + projectFile.type);
224    }
225  }
226
227  /**
228   * A utility for caching loaded trajectories. This allows for loading trajectories only once, and
229   * then reusing them.
230   */
231  public static class TrajectoryCache {
232    private final Map<String, Trajectory<?>> cache;
233
234    /** Creates a new TrajectoryCache with a normal {@link HashMap} as the cache. */
235    public TrajectoryCache() {
236      cache = new HashMap<>();
237    }
238
239    /**
240     * Creates a new TrajectoryCache with a custom cache.
241     *
242     * <p>this could be useful if you want to use a concurrent map or a map with a maximum size.
243     *
244     * @param cache The cache to use.
245     */
246    public TrajectoryCache(Map<String, Trajectory<?>> cache) {
247      requireNonNullParam(cache, "cache", "TrajectoryCache.<init>");
248      this.cache = cache;
249    }
250
251    /**
252     * Load a trajectory from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects .traj files to be placed in
253     * src/main/deploy/choreo/[trajectoryName].traj.
254     *
255     * <p>This method will cache the loaded trajectory and reused it if it is requested again.
256     *
257     * @param trajectoryName the path name in Choreo, which matches the file name in the deploy
258     *     directory, file extension is optional.
259     * @return the loaded trajectory, or `Optional.empty()` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
260     * @see Choreo#loadTrajectory(String)
261     */
262    public Optional<? extends Trajectory<?>> loadTrajectory(String trajectoryName) {
263      requireNonNullParam(trajectoryName, "trajectoryName", "TrajectoryCache.loadTrajectory");
264      if (cache.containsKey(trajectoryName)) {
265        return Optional.of(cache.get(trajectoryName));
266      } else {
267        return Choreo.loadTrajectory(trajectoryName)
268            .map(
269                trajectory -> {
270                  cache.put(trajectoryName, trajectory);
271                  return trajectory;
272                });
273      }
274    }
275
276    /**
277     * Load a section of a split trajectory from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects .traj files
278     * to be placed in src/main/deploy/choreo/[trajectoryName].traj.
279     *
280     * <p>This method will cache the loaded trajectory and reused it if it is requested again. The
281     * trajectory that is split off of will also be cached.
282     *
283     * @param trajectoryName the path name in Choreo, which matches the file name in the deploy
284     *     directory, file extension is optional.
285     * @param splitIndex the index of the split trajectory to load
286     * @return the loaded trajectory, or `Optional.empty()` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
287     * @see Choreo#loadTrajectory(String)
288     */
289    public Optional<? extends Trajectory<?>> loadTrajectory(String trajectoryName, int splitIndex) {
290      requireNonNullParam(trajectoryName, "trajectoryName", "TrajectoryCache.loadTrajectory");
291      // make the key something that could never possibly be a valid trajectory name
292      String key = trajectoryName + ".:." + splitIndex;
293      if (cache.containsKey(key)) {
294        return Optional.of(cache.get(key));
295      } else if (cache.containsKey(trajectoryName)) {
296        return cache
297            .get(trajectoryName)
298            .getSplit(splitIndex)
299            .map(
300                trajectory -> {
301                  cache.put(key, trajectory);
302                  return trajectory;
303                });
304      } else {
305        return Choreo.loadTrajectory(trajectoryName)
306            .flatMap(
307                trajectory -> {
308                  cache.put(trajectoryName, trajectory);
309                  return trajectory
310                      .getSplit(splitIndex)
311                      .map(
312                          split -> {
313                            cache.put(key, split);
314                            return split;
315                          });
316                });
317      }
318    }
319
320    /** Clear the cache. */
321    public void clear() {
322      cache.clear();
323    }
324  }
325
326  /**
327   * Create a factory that can be used to create {@link AutoRoutine} and {@link AutoTrajectory}.
328   *
329   * @param <SampleType> The type of samples in the trajectory.
330   * @param poseSupplier A function that returns the current field-relative {@link Pose2d} of the
331   *     robot.
332   * @param controller A function that receives the current {@link SampleType} and controls the
333   *     robot.
334   * @param driveSubsystem The drive {@link Subsystem} to require for {@link AutoTrajectory} {@link
335   *     Command}s.
336   * @param useAllianceFlipping If this returns true, when on the red alliance, the path will be
337   *     mirrored to the opposite side, while keeping the same coordinate system origin. This will
338   *     be called every loop during the command.
339   * @param bindings Universal trajectory event bindings.
340   * @return An {@link AutoFactory} that can be used to create {@link AutoRoutine} and {@link
341   *     AutoTrajectory}.
342   * @see AutoChooser using this factory with AutoChooser to generate auto routines.
343   */
344  public static <SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>> AutoFactory createAutoFactory(
345      Supplier<Pose2d> poseSupplier,
346      Consumer<SampleType> controller,
347      BooleanSupplier useAllianceFlipping,
348      Subsystem driveSubsystem,
349      AutoBindings bindings) {
350    return new AutoFactory(
351        requireNonNullParam(poseSupplier, "poseSupplier", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
352        requireNonNullParam(controller, "controller", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
353        requireNonNullParam(driveSubsystem, "driveSubsystem", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
354        requireNonNullParam(useAllianceFlipping, "useAllianceFlipping", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
355        requireNonNullParam(bindings, "bindings", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
356        Optional.empty());
357  }
358
359  /**
360   * Create a factory that can be used to create {@link AutoRoutine} and {@link AutoTrajectory}.
361   *
362   * @param <SampleType> The type of samples in the trajectory.
363   * @param poseSupplier A function that returns the current field-relative {@link Pose2d} of the
364   *     robot.
365   * @param controller A function that receives the current {@link SampleType} and controls the
366   *     robot.
367   * @param driveSubsystem The drive {@link Subsystem} to require for {@link AutoTrajectory} {@link
368   *     Command}s.
369   * @param useAllianceFlipping If this returns true, when on the red alliance, the path will be
370   *     mirrored to the opposite side, while keeping the same coordinate system origin. This will
371   *     be called every loop during the command.
372   * @param bindings Universal trajectory event bindings.
373   * @param trajectoryLogger A {@link TrajectoryLogger} to log {@link Trajectory} as they start and
374   *     finish.
375   * @return An {@link AutoFactory} that can be used to create {@link AutoRoutine} and {@link
376   *     AutoTrajectory}.
377   * @see AutoChooser using this factory with AutoChooser to generate auto routines.
378   */
379  public static <SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>> AutoFactory createAutoFactory(
380      Supplier<Pose2d> poseSupplier,
381      Consumer<SampleType> controller,
382      BooleanSupplier useAllianceFlipping,
383      Subsystem driveSubsystem,
384      AutoBindings bindings,
385      TrajectoryLogger<SampleType> trajectoryLogger) {
386    return new AutoFactory(
387        requireNonNullParam(poseSupplier, "poseSupplier", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
388        requireNonNullParam(controller, "controller", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
389        requireNonNullParam(driveSubsystem, "driveSubsystem", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
390        requireNonNullParam(useAllianceFlipping, "useAllianceFlipping", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
391        requireNonNullParam(bindings, "bindings", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
392        Optional.of(trajectoryLogger));
393  }
394
395  /**
396   * Create a factory that can be used to create {@link AutoRoutine} and {@link AutoTrajectory}.
397   *
398   * @param <SampleType> The type of samples in the trajectory.
399   * @param poseSupplier A function that returns the current field-relative {@link Pose2d} of the
400   *     robot.
401   * @param controller A function that receives the current {@link SampleType} and controls the
402   *     robot.
403   * @param driveSubsystem The drive {@link Subsystem} to require for {@link AutoTrajectory} {@link
404   *     Command}s.
405   * @param useAllianceFlipping If this returns true, when on the red alliance, the path will be
406   *     mirrored to the opposite side, while keeping the same coordinate system origin. This will
407   *     be called every loop during the command.
408   * @param bindings Universal trajectory event bindings.
409   * @param trajectoryLogger A {@link TrajectoryLogger} to log {@link Trajectory} as they start and
410   *     finish.
411   * @param alliance A custom supplier of the current alliance to use instead of {@link
412   *     DriverStation#getAlliance}.
413   * @return An {@link AutoFactory} that can be used to create {@link AutoRoutine} and {@link
414   *     AutoTrajectory}.
415   * @see AutoChooser using this factory with AutoChooser to generate auto routines.
416   */
417  public static <SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>> AutoFactory createAutoFactory(
418      Supplier<Pose2d> poseSupplier,
419      Consumer<SampleType> controller,
420      Subsystem driveSubsystem,
421      BooleanSupplier useAllianceFlipping,
422      AutoBindings bindings,
423      TrajectoryLogger<SampleType> trajectoryLogger,
424      Supplier<Optional<Alliance>> alliance) {
425    return new AutoFactory(
426        requireNonNullParam(poseSupplier, "poseSupplier", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
427        requireNonNullParam(controller, "controller", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
428        requireNonNullParam(driveSubsystem, "driveSubsystem", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
429        requireNonNullParam(useAllianceFlipping, "useAllianceFlipping", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
430        requireNonNullParam(bindings, "bindings", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
431        Optional.of(trajectoryLogger),
432        requireNonNullParam(alliance, "alliance", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"));
433  }
434}
